# The `SlotTracker` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class provides computation of slot numbers for LLVM Assembly writing. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::SlotTracker</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class provides computation of slot numbers for LLVM Assembly writing.

Definition at line 698 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp">AsmWriter.cpp</a>.

### purgeFunction() {#a3cbc4a42a4d42b46b1202a67ee830fb7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void SlotTracker::purgeFunction ()">
After calling incorporateFunction, use this method to remove the most recently incorporated function from the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slottracker">SlotTracker</a>.

Clean up after incorporating a function.

This will reset the state of the machine back to just the module contents.

This is the only way to get out of the function incorporation state that affects get&#42;Slot/Create&#42;Slot. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> incorporation state is indicated by TheFunction != 0.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp/#l00810">810</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/asmwriter-cpp">AsmWriter.cpp</a>.
